segments.text: This motor oil case is still really slippery .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , why not ? I think I want a chocolate chip cookie , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By the way , I heard Kitty's just got in a shipment of Jamaican Blue Mountain .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's only the rarest coffee in the world ! Didn't your momma teach you anything when you were growing up ?
segments.speaker: S2
